characterabilities.name: Alternative History
characterabilities.description: This model is not allowed in competitive play events.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Disjunction
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model casts a spell while in this model's CMD range, double the COST of the spell. Additionally, enemy models must pay double to upkeep spells on models/units in this model's CMD range.

characterabilities.name: Cull Soul
characterabilities.description: This model gains soul tokens from living enemy models that are destroyed within 2" of this model. After this model replenishes focus during your next Control Phase, replace each soul token with 1 focus/fury/essence point.

characterabilities.name: Death Magic
characterabilities.description: During its activation, this model can remove friendly Grunt models in its unit from play to make additional melee attacks or to boost accuracy or damage rolls. It can make one additional melee attack or boost one roll for each model removed. When this model would suffer damage, you can choose one or more models in its unit that are in formation to suffer any number of those damage points instead, divided as you choose. If you do, this model does not suffer that damage. A model cannot suffer more damage as a result of Death Magic than it has unmarked damage boxes.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Undead] [Shield Guard]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Undead models gain Shield Guard.

characterabilities.name: Flank [Undead]
characterabilities.description: When this model makes a melee attack against an enemy model in the melee range of a friendly Undead model, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an additional damage die.

characterabilities.name: Morrdhic Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

characterabilities.name: Passive Necromancy
characterabilities.description: Once per turn when another living warrior model in this model's CMD range is destroyed by an enemy attack, you can choose to remove the boxed model from play and replace it with a Thrall Warrior model. The Thrall Warrior must forfeit it's combat action the turn it is put into play.

characterabilities.name: Range Amplifier
characterabilities.description: When this model casts a spell and is the point of origin for the spell, the spell gains +5 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [Unlimited Tokens]
characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. there is no limit to how many tokens it can carry.

characterabilities.name: Unholy Desecration
characterabilities.description: When a living model is destroyed in this model's CMD range, this model gains the destroyed model's corpse token. At the end of your next Control Phase, remove all corpse tokens from this model and add to play one Thrall Warrior Solo model for each 3 corpse token's removed within 3" of this model. The Thrall Warrior must forfeit it's Combat action the turn it is put into play.

feat.name: Unholy Communion
feat.description: Choose 9 enemy non-Leader warrior models currently in Alexia's Control range. Living models chosen suffer a boostable POW 12 corrosion damage roll. Take Control of undead models chosen, which become friendly independent models and can activate normally this turn. Unholy Communion lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Mistress of the Witchfire Blade -"Now I call my army of the dead, the Cauldron Born, arise, my messengers of death, our time has arrived."

ability.name: Death Toll [small or medium-based]
ability.description: When this weapon boxes a living enemy warrior model during this model's combat action, remove that model from play and add one Grunt to a friendly small or medium-based unit in this model's CMD range. Place the grunt in formation and in this model's CMD range. The Grunt must forfeit it's combat Action the turn it was put into play.

ability.name: Devour Essence
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses all essence points and soul tokens.

ability.name: Energy Siphon
ability.description: When this attack hits an enemy model with 1 or more focus, fury, or essence points on it, that model loses 1 focus, fury or essence point and this model gains 1 focus or fury point.

ability.name: Life Drinker
ability.description: When an attack with this weapon destroys a living enemy model, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can remove d3 damage points.

spells.name: Banishing Ward
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on target friendly model/unit expire. Affected models cannot be targeted by enemy spells or animi.

spells.name: Bleed
spells.description: When Bleed damages a living enemy model, this model can remove d3 damage points.

spells.name: Hollow
spells.description: Target friendly Faction unit gains +2 ARM, Undead and Soul Vessel. Once per turn when an affected model is disabled by an enemy attack, replace it with a friendly Void Spirit model. A model replaced by hollow is destroyed. The spellcaster gains its soul token regardless of the proximity of other models. (A model with soul Vessel generates soul tokens as if it were a living model.).

spells.name: Obliteration
spells.description: The force of this attack blasts apart the earth itself.

spells.name: Vision
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model is directly hit by an attack, you can choose to have it suffer no damage roll from the attack, then Vision expires.

characterabilities.name: Blood-Quenched
characterabilities.description: This model gains a cumulative +1 ARM and +1 to its melee damage rolls for each enemy model it destroys with a melee attack during its activation. This bonus lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Shield Guard]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Shield Guard.

characterabilities.name: Sidestep
characterabilities.description: When this model hits an enemy model with an initial melee attack or a melee special attack, it can advance up to 2" after the attack is resolved.

feat.name: Defiance of the Void
feat.description: While in Makeda's Control range, friendly living models gain Retaliatory Strike. Additionally, when a friendly living warrior model in this model's Control range is disabled, this model can suffer 1 damage point to remove 1 damage point from the disabled model. This damage cannot be transferred. Defiance of the Void lasts for one round. (If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by an enemy melee attack during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved it can immediately make one basic melee attack against the attacking model. A model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.)

execution.name: Primal Rage
execution.description: Once per turn, when this model suffers damage from an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance toward the attacking model and can make one basic melee attack.

spells.name: Carnage
spells.description: Friendly Faction models gain +2 to melee attack rolls against enemy models in the spellcaster's Control Range. Carnage lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Jackhammer
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup immediately makes one basic melee attack.

spells.name: Quicken
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 SPD and DEF against ranged and magic attack rolls.

spells.name: The Lash
spells.description: If The Lash hits an enemy model, immediately after the attack is resolved this model or a friendly Faction model within 3" of it can advance up to 2". A model can advance only once per turn as a result of The Lash.

characterabilities.name: Alpha Hunter
characterabilities.description: Warbeasts in this model's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range can run, charge, or make power attacks without being forced. When this model destroys one or more enemy modes during its activation, warbeasts in its battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2 SPD and MAT for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Maltreatment
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, anytime during your activation phase except while activating another model, this model can remove 1 fury point from a warbeast in its battlegroup that is in its Control Range and add 1 fury point to it's own current total. The warbeast suffers d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.

feat.name: Whispers of Torment
feat.description: While in Beast Master Xekaar's Control range, enemy models suffer -3 MAT, RAT, THR and -3 damage on their melee attacks. Whispers of Torment lasts for one round.

execution.name: Furious Lashing
execution.description: This model's melee weapons gain Chain Strike. (This weapon becomes RNG 4 during this model's activation.)

ability.name: Dispel
ability.description: When this weapon hits a model/unit, upkeep spells and animi on that model/unit immediately expire.

spells.name: Deadweight
spells.description: When Deadweight destroys an enemy living or undead model, choose an enemy model within 2" of it. The chose model must forfeit either its Normal Movement or its Combat Action during its next activation, as its controller chooses.

spells.name: Mortality
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2DEF and ARM, loses Tough, and cannot have damage removed from it. Mortality lasts for one round.

spells.name: Psycho Surgery
spells.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately remove d3+1 damage points. This spell can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Pursuit
spells.description: If target enemy model/unit advances during its activation, one model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can immediately make a full advance.

characterabilities.name: Acrobatics
characterabilities.description: This model can advance through other models if it has enough movement to move completely past their bases. This model ignores intervening models when declaring its charge target.

characterabilities.name: Blade of the Empire
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy multi-boxed models with a melee attack during its unit's activation, other friendly faction warrior models gain +2 to their melee attack damage rolls while in this model's CMD range. Blade of the Empire lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Granted [Reposition [3"]]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Reposition [3"].

characterabilities.name: Hidden Blade
characterabilities.description: This model gains an additional die on damage rolls against models suffering Blind.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

feat.name: Death Wind
feat.description: Dominar Morghoul & Escorts and friendly Faction warrior models beginning their activations in Morghoul's Control range gain Acrobatics, Overtake, and Unstoppable. Death Wind lasts for one turn. (When a model with Overtake destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, after the attack is resolved it can immediately advance up to 1".)

execution.name: Leadership [Paingiver Bloodrunners] [Eye-Thief]
execution.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly faction Paingiver Bloodrunners gain Eye-Thief.

ability.name: Critical Decapitation
ability.description: On a critical hit, double the damage exceeding the ARM of the model hit. A model disabled by this attack cannot make a Tough roll.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

spells.name: Flashing Blade
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes one basic attack with one of its melee weapons against each enemy model in its LOS that is in the weapon's melee range. These attacks are simultaneous.

spells.name: Mirage
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Apparition. (During your Control Phase, place models with Apparition anywhere completely within 2" of their current locations.).

spells.name: Night's Reflection
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers Blind for one round. (A model suffering Blind cannot make range or magic attacks, suffers -4 MAT and DEF, and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks. It must forfeit either its Normal Movement or Combat Action during tis next activation. Blind can be shaken.).

spells.name: Occultation
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Model/Unit gains Stealth. Models are not affected while out of formation.

characterabilities.name: Anatomical Precision
characterabilities.description: When this model's melee damage roll fails to exceed the ARM of a living model hit, that model suffers 1 damage point. A model disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough Roll.

ability.name: Blind
ability.description: When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it suffers Blind for one round. (A model suffering Blind cannot make range or magic attacks, suffers -4 MAT and DEF, and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks. It must forfeit either its Normal Movement or Combat Action during its next activation. Blind can be shaken.)

characterabilities.name: Dark Rituals
characterabilities.description: This model can channel spells through friendly Faction warrior models in its Control Range. Immediately after a spell is channeled through a model as a result of Dark Rituals, the model it was channeled through suffers d3 points of Arcane damage.

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Skorne]
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Infernals army. If it is, it becomes an Infernal model and not a Skorne model. If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Skorne Cohort can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless]. Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Skorne units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Skorne Solos as well.

characterabilities.name: Impervious Flesh
characterabilities.description: When this model suffers a damage roll, roll one fewer die.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

feat.name: Plague Wind
feat.description: While in Rasheth's Control range, enemy models suffer -2 STR, DEF and ARM. When a living model is destroyed in his Control range, Rasheth can remove 1 damage point. Plague Wind lasts for one round.

execution.name: Opulence of House Telaar
execution.description: On the first turn of the game, this model gains Reposition [4"].

spells.name: Blood Mark
spells.description: Target enemy model suffers -2 ARM. The spellcaster can transfer damage from an enemy attack to the affected model one time, then Blood Mark expires.

spells.name: Breath of Corruption
spells.description: Models hit suffer a POW 12 corrosion damage roll. This spell's AOE is a cloud effect and hazard that remains in play for one round. Models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer 1 point of corrosion damage.

spells.name: Carnivore
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 to melee attack rolls against living models. When an affected model destroys a living model with a melee attack, the destroyed model is removed from play and the spellcaster can remove d3 damage points.

spells.name: Castigate
spells.description: Enemy models cannot be used to channel spells or be forced to cast an animus while in the spellcaster's Control Range. Castigate lasts for one round.

spells.name: Influence
spells.description: Take Control of target enemy non-Leader warrior model. The model immediately makes one basic attack, then Influence expires. A model can be affected by Influence only once per turn.

spells.name: Sunder Spirit
spells.description: An enemy warbeast damaged by Sunder Spirit loses its animus for one round.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Channeler]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Channeler.

characterabilities.name: Vampiric Harvest
characterabilities.description: When a living enemy model is destroyed in this model's Control Range, a model in this model's battlegroup that is in it's Control Range can remove 1 damage point.

feat.name: Arcane Reaver
feat.description: Immediately remove any number of soul tokens, fury points, essence points, and focus points from non-Leader models in Lord Arbiter Hexeris' Control range. For each token or point removed, place 1 fury point on Hexeris. Hexeris cannot exceed his current ARC in fury points as a result of Arcane Reaver.

execution.name: Arcane Consumption
execution.description: When an enemy model declares it is casting a spell while in this model's CMD range, the enemy spellcaster immediately suffers d3 damage points and this model can remove d3 damage points. If the enemy spellcaster is destroyed as a result of this damage, the spell does not take effect.

ability.name: Thresher (★Attack)
ability.description: This model makes one melee attack with this weapon against each model in it's LOS that is in this weapon's melee range. Thresher attacks are simultaneous.

spells.name: Banishing Ward
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on target friendly model/unit expire. Affected models cannot be targeted by enemy spells or animi.

spells.name: Black Spot
spells.description: Target enemy warrior model/unit suffers -2 DEF. When a friendly Faction model destroys one or more affected models with a basic melee or ranged attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one additional melee or ranged attack. Attacks gained from Black Spot cannot generate additional attacks from Black Spot.

spells.name: Cloak of Ash
spells.description: Target Friendly Faction model/unit gains Ashen Veil. Models are not affected while out of formation. (A model with Ashen Veil has concealment. Living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffer -2 to attack rolls while within 2" of a model with Ashen Veil.

spells.name: Eruption
spells.description: This attack causes fire damage. Place a cloud effect template centered on the model targeted. The template is a hazard that remains in play for one round. A model without Resistance: Fire entering or ending its activation in the AOE suffers the Fire continuous effect.

spells.name: Stranglehold
spells.description: A model damaged by Stranglehold forfeits either it's Normal Movement or it's Combat Action during it's next activation as it's Control chooses.

characterabilities.name: Apparition
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, warp this model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Bloodrunners] [Unstoppable]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Bloodrunners models gain Unstoppable.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

feat.name: Blackout
feat.description: Enemy models currently in Morghoul's Control range and LOS suffer Blind for one round. (A model suffering Blind cannot make range or magic attacks, suffers -4 MAT and DEF, and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks. It must forfeit either its Normal Movement or Combat Action during tis next activation. Blind can be shaken.)

execution.name: Riposte
execution.description: When this model is missed by an enemy melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one basic melee attack against the attacking model.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

ability.name: Blind
ability.description: When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it suffers Blind for one round. (A model suffering Blind cannot make range or magic attacks, suffers -4 MAT and DEF, and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks. It must forfeit either its Normal Movement or Combat Action during its next activation. Blind can be shaken.)

spells.name: Flashing Blade
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes one basic attack with one of its melee weapons against each enemy model in its LOS that is in the weapon's melee range. These attacks are simultaneous.

spells.name: Flesh Hooks
spells.description: Target model damaged by Flesh Hooks cannot charge or make slam or trample power attacks for one round.

spells.name: Mortality
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2DEF and ARM, loses Tough, and cannot have damage removed from it. Mortality lasts for one round.

spells.name: Shadow Play
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model gains Incorporeal this turn. During your Control Phase the affected model gains Incorporeal for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Great Power
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, this model can upkeep one spell without spending focus, fury or essence.

characterabilities.name: Vampiric Reaving
characterabilities.description: This model can reave fury from enemy warbeasts destroyed in it's Control Range if it is closer to the warbeast than all other models that could reave it's fury.

feat.name: Dark Dominion
feat.description: When a living or undead enemy warrior model is boxed by an attack while in Lord Tyrant Hexeris' Control range, you can take Control of it. The model becomes an independent model and gains Undead. The model can immediately advance up to 3" and can make one basic melee attack, then remove the model from play. The model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. Dark Dominion lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Grizzled
execution.description: This model gains Tough.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

spells.name: Death March
spells.description: Target friendly Faction unit gains +2 MAT and Vengeance. (During your Maintenance Phase, if one or more models in a unit with Vengeance were damaged by enemy attacks during the last round, each model in the unit can advance 3" and make one basic melee attack.).

spells.name: Obliteration
spells.description: The force of this attack blasts apart the earth itself.

spells.name: Parasite
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -3 ARM and the spellcaster gains +1 ARM.

spells.name: Soul Slave
spells.description: Target warbeast in the spellcaster's battlegroup automatically passes threshold checks. The spellcaster can channel spells through that warbeast.

spells.name: Sunder Spirit
spells.description: An enemy warbeast damaged by Sunder Spirit loses its animus for one round.

characterabilities.name: Blade Shield
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 DEF against ranged attack accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.name: Flank [Warbeast in this model's battlegroup]
characterabilities.description: When this model makes a melee attack against an enemy model in the melee range of a friendly Warbeast in this model's battlegroup model, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an additional damage die.

characterabilities.name: Focused Strike
characterabilities.description: When this model damages a warjack or warbeast with a melee attack, choose which column or branch suffers the damage.

characterabilities.name: Sacrificial Pawn [Warbeast in this model's battlegroup]
characterabilities.description: When this model is directly hit by an enemy ranged attack, you can have one friendly, non-incorporeal Warbeast in this model's battlegroup model within 3" of it directly hit instead. That model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. The Sacrificial Pawn special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

feat.name: Scorpion's Sting
feat.description: While in Zaadesh's Control range, friendly Faction models gain +2 MAT and +2 to their melee attack damage rolls and Defensive Strike. Scorpion's Sting lasts for one round. (Once per turn, when an enemy model advances into and ends its movement, or is placed in the melee range of a model with Defensive Strike, the model with Defensive Strike can immediately make one basic melee attack against it.)

execution.name: Call to Sacrifice [Praetorian]
execution.description: If this model is disabled by an enemy attack, you can choose a non-disabled friendly Praetorian model within 5" of this model to be destroyed. If another model is destroyed as a result of Call to Sacrifice, remove 1 damage point from this model.

ability.name: Critical Decapitation
ability.description: On a critical hit, double the damage exceeding the ARM of the model hit. A model disabled by this attack cannot make a Tough roll.

spells.name: Burning Ash
spells.description: Place a 3" AOE cloud effect anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. While in the AOE, living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffers -2 to attack rolls. The AOE remains in play for one round.

spells.name: Flashing Blade
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes one basic attack with one of its melee weapons against each enemy model in its LOS that is in the weapon's melee range. These attacks are simultaneous.

spells.name: Hand of Fate
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains an additional die on attack and damage rolls. Discard the low die in each roll.

spells.name: Inviolable Resolve
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 ARM and cannot be knocked down or moved by a push or a slam.

spells.name: Killing Ground
spells.description: Friendly Faction models beginning a charge in the spellcaster's Control Range gain Pathfinder. Warbeasts in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range can charge or make slam power attacks against enemy models without being forced. Killing Ground lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Nihilator] [Groundwork]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Nihilator models gain Groundwork.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Pain Response]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Pain Response.

characterabilities.name: Flagellant
characterabilities.description: This model is automatically hit by melee attacks made by friendly models.

characterabilities.name: Painmonger
characterabilities.description: When this model suffers damage from an attack, it gains one blood token. For each blood token on this model, it gains +1 ARM and +1 to its melee attack damage rolls. This model can have up to five blood tokens at any time. Remove 1 blood token from this model at the start of your Control Phase if it wasn't damaged by an attack during the last round.

characterabilities.name: Rapid Healing
characterabilities.description: When this model is damaged by an enemy attack, immediately after the attack is resolved remove d3 damage points from it.

feat.name: Insufferable Pain
feat.description: Naaresh immediately suffers any number of damage points. For each damage point suffered as a result of Insufferable Pain, one friendly Faction model currently in his Control range gains +3 SPD and +3 STR  for one round. Naaresh cannot spend fury points to reduce this damage. For each damage point Narresh suffers from this effect, he gains 1 blood token up to his maximum of 5.

execution.name: Retaliatory Strike
execution.description: If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by a melee attack made by an enemy model during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved the model with Retaliatory Strike can immediately make one basic melee attack against that model. The model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.

ability.name: Combo Strike (★Attack)
ability.description: Make a melee attack. Instead of making a normal damage roll, the POW of the damage roll is equal to this model's STR plus twice the POW of this weapon.

ability.description: When an attack with this weapon destroys a living enemy model, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can remove d3 damage points.

spells.name: Iron Flesh
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 ARM and Blast Resistance. Models are not affected while out of formation. (A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.).

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

The warbeast suffers d3 damage points.

feat.description: While in Morghoul's Control range, enemy non-Leader models cannot have damage transferred to them, be forced or spend focus, fury, or essence except to pay tithe. Pain & Suffering lasts for one round.

execution.name: Field Marshal [Extended Control Range]
execution.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Extended Control Range.

ability.name: Double Strike
ability.description: This model can spend fury to make two additional attacks with this weapon for each fury point spent.

ability.name: Inflict Pain
ability.description: When this weapon hits a warbeast, this model can place 1 fury point on or remove 1 fury point from the hit warbeast.

spells.name: Abuse
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warbeast gains +2 SPD and +2 to its melee attack damage rolls for one turn but suffers d3 damage points.

spells.name: Admonition
spells.description: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement or is warped within 6" of target model in this spellcaster's battlegroup, the affected model can immediately advance up to 3", then Admonition expires.

spells.name: Torment
spells.description: When a model is damaged by Torment, for one round it loses Tough, cannot remove damage, and cannot transfer damage.

characterabilities.name: Hunter
characterabilities.description: This model ignores concealment and cover when making ranged attacks.

characterabilities.name: Prey
characterabilities.description: After deployment but before the first player's turn, choose an enemy model/unit to be this model/unit's prey. This model gains +2 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against it's prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit to be the prey.

characterabilities.name: Resourceful
characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

feat.name: Hide in Sight
feat.description: When an enemy model makes an attack accuracy roll against a friendly Faction model in Jalaam's Control range, the enemy model rolls one less die. Hide in Sight lasts for one round.

execution.name: Blend In [Venerator Reivers]
execution.description: This model cannot be targeted by attacks, charges, or slam power attacks while there is one or more other friendly Venerator Reivers models within 3" of it.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

ability.name: Volume Fire
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon gain +1 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against medium-based models and +2 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against large, extra-large, and huge-based models.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds

characterabilities.name: Bond [Xekaar]
characterabilities.description: If this model begins the game in Xekaar's battlegroup, it is bonded to him. This model is not considered to be bonded while under your opponent's control. While this model is bonded to Xekaar and in his Control range, it gains boosted ranged accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.name: Dig In (★Action)
characterabilities.description: This model gains cover, does not suffer blast damage, and does not block LOS. The model remains dug in until it moves, is placed, or is engaged. It can begin the game dug in.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Basilisks] [Dig In]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Basilisks models gain Dig In.

ability.name: Black Penny
ability.description: This attack ignores the target in melee DEF bonus.

ability.name: Inflict Pain
ability.description: When this weapon hits a warbeast, this model can place 1 fury point on or remove 1 fury point from the hit warbeast.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

animi.name: Counterblast
animi.description: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement in the spellcaster's command range, the spellcaster can make one basic melee or ranged attack targeting that model, then Counterblast expires. Counterblast lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Intuition
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model targets this model with an attack and the accuracy roll results in a hit, you can immediately force this model to cause the enemy model to reroll the attack roll.

characterabilities.name: Set Defense
characterabilities.description: A model in this model's front arc suffers -2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact attack accuracy rolls against this model.

characterabilities.name: Shield Guard
characterabilities.description: When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have this model directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

animi.name: Safeguard
animi.description: The spellcaster cannot become knocked down, made stationary, is not moved by pushes or slams and does not suffer collateral damage.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Precision
characterabilities.description: If this model uses its Normal Movement to aim, it ignores cloud effects when determining LOS and ignores Stealth that activation.

characterabilities.name: Gun Platform
characterabilities.description: This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.

ability.name: Volume Fire
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon gain +1 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against medium-based models and +2 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against large, extra-large, and huge-based models.

animi.name: Far Strike
animi.description: The spellcaster's Ranged weapons gain Snipe. Far Strike lasts for one turn. (An attack with a weapon with Snipe gains +4 RNG.)

characterabilities.name: Future Sight
characterabilities.description: This model can boost attack accuracy and damage rolls after rolling.

ability.name: Critical Brutal Damage
ability.description: On a critical hit, gain an additional die on this weapon's damage rolls against the target directly hit.

animi.name: Prescience
animi.description: Target friendly Faction model gains Future Sight. Prescience lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Craft Talisman (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 3. Target friendly Faction warlock. If the warlock is in range, when it casts a spell and is the point of origin, the spell gains +2 RNG. Spells with RNG SELF, SP, or CTRL are not affected. Craft Talisman lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Primal Magic
characterabilities.description: This model can be forced to cast the animus of any friendly Faction non-character warbeast in its CMD range as if the animus were its own.

ability.name: Ghost Shot
ability.description: This model ignores LOS, Concealment, and cover when making attacks with this weapon.

animi.name: Spirit Blade
animi.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on target model/unit expire.

characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

characterabilities.name: Circular Vision
characterabilities.description: Models never gain a back strike bonus against this model.

characterabilities.name: Hyper-Regeneration
characterabilities.description: Remove d3 damage points from this model at the start of each of it's activations.

characterabilities.name: Multiple Heads [5]
characterabilities.description: This model can make 5 initial attacks each Combat Action, using any combination of attacks with its weapons. This model loses an initial attack for each of its aspects that are currently crippled. This model cannot be forced to make additional ranged attacks.

characterabilities.name: Snacking
characterabilities.description: When this model boxes a living model with a melee attack, it can choose to remove the boxed model from play. When it does, this model can remove d3 damage points.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Armored Head
subabilities.description: This melee attack gains Open Fist and Chain weapon as well as Critical Pitch. (On a critical hit against a model with an equal or smaller base, the model hit can be thrown d6" directly away from this model. The model thrown does not deviate. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the STR of this model.)

subabilities.name: Bite
subabilities.description: This melee attack gains Grevious Wounds and Critical Consume. (A model hit by a weapon with Grievous Wounds loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.) (On a critical hit, if an attack with Consume hits a small-based non-Leader model, the model hit is removed from play.)

animi.name: Sandstorm
animi.description: When an enemy model targets a model in the spellcaster's command range with a ranged attack with a RNG greater than 8", the attack suffers –3 RNG to a minimum of 8".

characterabilities.name: Black Arts
characterabilities.description: A friendly Cryx warcaster with one or more models in this unit in his Control area can upkeep one spell without spending a focus point.

characterabilities.name: Bond [Mordikaar]
characterabilities.description: If this model begins the game inMordikaar's battlegroup, it is bonded to him. This model is not considered to be bonded while under your opponent's control. While this model is bonded to Mordikaar and in his Control range, once per round when a living enemy warrior model is boxed while within 5” of this model, remove the boxed model from play and replace it with a Void Spirit model.

characterabilities.name: Dark Shroud
characterabilities.description: While in this model's melee range, enemy models suffer -2 ARM.

ability.name: Critical Brutal Damage
ability.description: On a critical hit, gain an additional die on this weapon's damage rolls against the target directly hit.

animi.description: While within 10” of the spellcaster, when an enemy model casts a spell increase the COST of the spell by 1. Additionally, while within 10” of the spellcaster, enemy models must pay double to upkeep spells. Arcane Suppression lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Pain Maddened

ability.name: High-Explosive

ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models.

ability.name: Combo Strike (★Attack)
ability.description: Make a melee attack. Instead of making a normal damage roll, the POW of the damage roll is equal to this model's STR plus twice the POW of this weapon.

animi.name: Fate Walker
animi.description: The spellcaster gains Reposition [5”] this activation. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition [5”] can advance up to 5”, then it's activation ends.)

characterabilities.name: Ambush Deployment
characterabilities.description: You can choose not to deploy this model/unit at the start of the game. If it is not deployed normally, place a burrow marker at the same time as your models with Advance Deployment, up to 12" beyond your deployment zone, and not within 6” of another burrow marker.

characterabilities.name: Burrow (★Action)
characterabilities.description: Place a burrow marker in base contact with this model/leader of this unit. Then remove this model/unit from the table. Effects, spells, and animi on this model/unit expire when it uses Burrow.

characterabilities.name: Drag Below
characterabilities.description: During this model's activation, when this model boxes an enemy warrior model with a melee attack, this model can use Drag Below to remove the boxed model from play. Immediately after resolving this attack, this model can make a full advance and then perform a Burrow.

characterabilities.name: Extended Control Range
characterabilities.description: When checking to see if this model is in its controller's Control range, double the range.

characterabilities.name: Steady

characterabilities.name: Surface [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the beginning of any of your Maintenance Phases after your first turn, you can place this model/unit completely within 5" of the burrow marker and remove the marker from the table. Additionally, it must forfeit its Normal Movement during its activation the turn it is placed into play.

It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

characterabilities.name: Soul Ward

ability.name: Critical Blind
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit suffers Blind for one round. (A model suffering Blind cannot make ranged or magic attacks, suffers -2 MAT and DEF and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks. It must forfeit either its Normal Movement or Combat Action during its next activation. Blind can be shaken.)

characterabilities.name: Prey

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Death Driver
subabilities.description: When this weapon boxes a living or undead non-warcaster, non-warlock enemy warrior model, you can immediately take Control of the enemy model and make a full advance with it followed by a basic melee attack, then the boxed model is removed from play. The boxed model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

subabilities.name: Eruption of Ash
subabilities.description: If a model is boxed by an attack made with this weapon, center a 3" AOE cloud effect on the boxed model and then remove that model from play. The AOE is a hazard that remains in play for one round. Enemy models in the AOE when it was put in play are hit and suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Enemy models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Eruption of Ash damage rolls cannot be boosted.

subabilities.name: Thamar's Teeth
subabilities.description: When this weapon hits a model with soul tokens, the damage roll for this attack is boosted. After resolving an attack with this weapon, remove all soul tokens from models it hits.

characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by free strikes. This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy ranged attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing.

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Gun Platform
characterabilities.description: This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.

characterabilities.name: Propelled [12]
characterabilities.description: This model cannot run, aim, charge, or become knocked down. This model can advance up to 12” total during its Normal Movement. If this model advances less than 12” during its Normal Movement, it can advance its remaining movement at the end of its activation.

characterabilities.name: Shooting Gallery
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 to Ranged accuracy rolls against models within 5” of it.

ability.name: Crater
ability.description: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round.

ability.name: Critical Devastation
ability.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a damage roll with POW of collateral damage is equal to the blast damage POW of this weapon.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

characterabilities.name: Sky Ladder
characterabilities.description: When this model ends it's Normal Movement, choose one small or medium-based friendly solo model within 2” of it. You can place the chosen model completely within 2” of its current location. A model can be placed as a result of Sky Ladder only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.
